Mod.name: Hadal Difficulty
Mod.description:
A difficulty mod aiming to provide a uniquely painful experience.
[h1] What is changed? [/h1] [list] [*] Wands must be crafted [*] New Map (around twice the depth of vanilla map) [*] Orb requirement to progress through Holy Mountains [*] The Glomb (new boss) [*] Features [/list]
[h1] Questions [/h1] [b] How do I acquire wands? [/b] Wands can be acquired from vanilla puzzles, chests and crafting. To craft a wand you need a brace, handle and a core. The core determines the tier of the wand. To craft a wand just throw the 3 parts together. [b] Aren't Orbs difficult/annoying to find? [/b] Yes. However, most of the orbs in Hadal are acquired from killing bosses which have been moved around the map. [b] The Glomb? [/b] The Glomb. The arena to fight it can be accessed via a portal in the lukki lair
[h1] Credits [/h1] Me - mod Gustavo - help with scripts, bug fixing, more Horscht - settings code
